      • decryptMessage

        public java.lang.String decryptMessage(java.lang.String encryptedMessage)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Decrypt message - Receives an encrypted ciphertext from Alice and decrypts with the puzzle key saved after cracking via brute force.
        Parameters:
        encryptedMessage - - DES encrypted ciphertext - The encryption key has been agreed with Alice.
        Returns:
        - The decrypted message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - - Thrown if there was an error with decryption.
